original_title: Nous nous sommes rencontrés dans un autre rêve
overview: Yvan, who lives with his wife Éva and their 3 children in a villa by the sea, regularly has the same nightmare: Locked in a cellar, he is physically tortured and broken by executioners who want him to talk. But of what.
title: Nous nous sommes rencontrés dans un autre rêve
